Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_EventTrigger3
Text.Desc: Attract a group of strange little fairies

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_Lua
Text.SpecialDesc: A Flood Dragon suddenly appeared in [SCHOOL]!

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_Lua2
Text.SpecialDesc: A fierce phoenix suddenly appeared in [SCHOOL]!

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_Lua3
Text.SpecialDesc: A Torch Dragon suddenly appeared in [SCHOOL]!

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_DaNengChuShi
Text.SpecialDesc: [SCHOOL] has uncovered rumors about ancient cultivators...

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_BeginWeather
Text.Desc: Create a romantic ambiance within the sect

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_RandomCreatureInjured
Text.Desc: A random creature on the map suffers minor injuries.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_RandomCreatureInjured2
Text.Desc: A random living being on the map suffers severe injuries

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_RandomEnemyDies
Text.Desc: A random non-friendly character dies within the map.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_GetSchoolRelation
Text.Desc: A specific Sect gains Favor for our Sect.
Text.SpecialDesc: [TARGET] has a slight appreciation of [SCHOOL], Favor increased!

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_GetSchoolRelation2
Text.Desc: A certain righteous sect becomes increasingly close to our sect.
Text.SpecialDesc: [TARGET] grows closer with [SCHOOL], Favor greatly increased!

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_GetSchoolRelation3
Text.Desc: A certain evil sect becomes increasingly close to our sect.
Text.SpecialDesc: [TARGET] grows closer with [SCHOOL], Favor greatly increased!

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_GetSchoolRelation4
Text.Desc: The just cultivators in the world respects our Sect even more.
Text.SpecialDesc: [TARGET] unanimously show respect for [SCHOOL], greatly increasing favor!

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_GetSchoolRelation5
Text.Desc: Worldly evil cultivators show greater respect to our Sect.
Text.SpecialDesc: [TARGET] unanimously show respect for [SCHOOL], greatly increasing favor!

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_GetItemThing5
Text.Desc: Randomly obtain a Five Elements spiritual root.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_GetItemThing7
Text.Desc: Randomly obtain a large amount of Spirit Stones.
Text.SpecialDesc: [SCHOOL] has gained a large amount of spirit stones!

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_GetItemThing8
Text.Desc: Randomly obtain a large amount of Amber.
Text.SpecialDesc: [SCHOOL] has acquired a large quantity of Anguish Soul Gems!

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_GetSchoolScore
Text.Desc: Gain a Bit of Sect Reputation
Text.SpecialDesc: [SCHOOL] has gained a bit of reputation!

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_GetSchoolScore2
Text.SpecialDesc: [SCHOOL]'s fame spreads widely, earning substantial Reputation!

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_GetSchoolScore3
Text.Desc: Make the sect's name resound throughout the universe.
Text.SpecialDesc: [SCHOOL]'s name resounds throughout the universe, gaining massive reputation!

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_HealthRecoverAtOnce
Text.SpecialDesc: [NPC] feels an unprecedented sense of comfort, as if all injuries and ailments have been swept away

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_RandomDrugToleranceCleared
Text.SpecialDesc: [NPC] feels some changes in the body, with resistance to a certain drug disappearing

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_Modifier_1
Text.Desc: Slightly enhances personal Qi recovery speed.
Text.SpecialDesc: [NPC]'s Qi recovery speed has been slightly increased

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_Modifier_3
Text.Desc: Greatly enhances personal Qi recovery speed.
Text.SpecialDesc: [NPC]'s Qi recovery speed has been significantly increased

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_GetZhuJiValue
Text.Desc: Gain a small amount of Foundation value

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_GetZhuJiValue2
Text.Desc: Gain a large amount of Foundation value

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_GetStageValue
Text.SpecialDesc: [NPC]'s cultivation has advanced, gaining some growth

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_Modifier_5
Text.Desc: Fundamentally increase one's own Qi limit
Text.SpecialDesc: [NPC]'s Qi cap has been fundamentally increased

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_Modifier_10
Text.Desc: Amplify the power of own Qi barrier
Text.SpecialDesc: [NPC]'s Qi barrier power has been increased

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_Modifier_11
Text.SpecialDesc: [NPC] becomes more likely to break through bottlenecks

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_Modifier_12
Text.SpecialDesc: [NPC] has obscured the Heavenly secrets, delaying the arrival of all heavenly tribulations

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_Modifier_19
Text.SpecialDesc: [NPC]'s natural body resilience has become stronger

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_Modifier_23
Text.Desc: Slightly enhance own foundation building speed.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_Modifier_25
Text.Desc: Significantly boost personal Foundation Training speed

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_Modifier_29
Text.Desc: Make it easier for oneself to gain epiphany.
Text.SpecialDesc: [NPC] becomes more likely to gain epiphany.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_Modifier_30
Text.SpecialDesc: [NPC]'s overall work efficiency has significantly improved

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_Modifier_40
Text.Desc: Increase own battle skill level by +1.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_Modifier_41
Text.Desc: Increase own battle skill level by +2.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_Modifier_43
Text.Desc: Increase own social skill level by +1.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_Modifier_44
Text.Desc: Increase own social skill level by +2.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_Modifier_46
Text.Desc: Increase own artisanry skill level by +1.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_Modifier_47
Text.Desc: Increase own artisanry skill level by +2.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_Modifier_49
Text.Desc: Increase own Qi sense skill level by +1.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_Modifier_50
Text.Desc: Increase own Qi sense skill level by +2.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_Modifier_51
Text.Desc: Increase your Qi Sense skill level by 1 (raises the cap).

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_Modifier_54
Text.Desc: Self Crafting/Artifact Crafting skill level +1 (raises cap).

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_Modifier_60
Text.Desc: Artifact Mastery skill level +1 (raises the cap).

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_Modifier_61
Text.Desc: Increase own Spell skill level by +1.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_Modifier_62
Text.Desc: Increase own Spell skill level by +2.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_Modifier_64
Text.Desc: Increase own protection skill level by +1.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_Modifier_65
Text.Desc: Increase own protection skill level by +2.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_Modifier_67
Text.Desc: Increase own array skill level by +1.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_Modifier_72
Text.Desc: Increase your Mining skill level by 1 (raises the cap).

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_Modifier_73
Text.Desc: Increase own farming skill level by +1.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_Modifier_74
Text.Desc: Increase own farming skill level by +2.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_Modifier_76
Text.Desc: Increase own construction skill level by +1.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_Modifier_77
Text.Desc: Increase own construction skill level by +2.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_Modifier_98
Text.Desc: Improve one's own work ability related to being a physician
Text.SpecialDesc: [NPC]'s work abilities related to healing have been improved

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_Modifier_99
Text.Desc: Increase your ability in butchery work.
Text.SpecialDesc: [NPC]'s work abilities related to butchering have been improved

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_Modifier_100
Text.Desc: Improve one's own work ability related to cooking
Text.SpecialDesc: [NPC]'s work abilities related to cooking have been improved

Text.Desc: Improve one's own work ability related to construction
Text.SpecialDesc: [NPC]'s work abilities related to construction have been improved

Text.Desc: Increase your ability in mining work.
Text.SpecialDesc: [NPC]'s work abilities related to mining have been improved

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_Modifier_103
Text.Desc: Improve one's own work ability related to peon tasks
Text.SpecialDesc: [NPC]'s work abilities related to manual labor have been improved

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_Modifier_105
Text.Desc: Increase personal tolerance to extreme cold.

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_Modifier_106
Text.SpecialDesc: [NPC]'s abilities related to alchemy have been improved

Text.Name: Mutation_Effect_Unstable_Modifier_108
Text.SpecialDesc: [NPC]'s abilities related to crafting artifacts have been improved

Text.SpecialDesc: [NPC]'s abilities related to farming have been improved
